mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_access_stats (short_uri, pv, uv, uip, access_date, access_hour, access_weekday, create_time, update_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{et.shortUri}, 1, 1, 1, #{et.accessDate}, #{et.accessHour}, #{et.accessWeekday}, #{et.createTime}, #{et.updateTime}, #{et.delFlag}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE pv = pv + 1, uv = #{et.uv}, uip = #{et.uip}, update_time = #{et.updateTime};
mapper.select: select sum(pv) as pv, sum(uv) as uv, sum(uip) as uip, access_date as accessDate from t_link_access_stats where short_uri = #{shortUri} and access_date = #{accessDate} group by accessDate
SELECT pv as cnt, access_hour as hour FROM t_link_access_stats WHERE short_uri = #{shortUri} AND ( (access_date = #{yesterday} AND access_hour > #{nowHour}) OR (access_date = #{today}) )
